title: GamersGoMakers [Steam-Rip] [ENG] (2014) (1.1)
description: Year of release : 2014 Genre : Simulation / Business Developer : Marco Leberfing Publisher : Marco Leberfing Platform : PC Version : 1.1 Publication Type : License Language : English Language voice : none / not required Medicine : Not required System requirements : VGA: Hardware Acceleration graphics RAM:> = 2GB RAM CPU: 2 GHz Dual core OS: Windows XP Screen resolution: 1280x768 Description : GamersGoMakers - it's a great game similar to the game dev tycoon. But in contrast to the game dev tycoon has more functionality greater bias to the complexity of the game. Key features: 1) 31 genre of games to choose from. 2) The actual impact on the creation of games (choose the right components of games 15h4 options). 3) Videos will be giving you tips to improve your games. 4) You can create patches, add-ons, sequels or new versions for different platforms. 5) Hire up to 21 employees with different spetsialzatsiyami 6) Develop new gaming technology. 7) Grow your business, rent or buy new offices. 8) Equip and improve 14 different studios, each of which will deal with some aspects of the game. Such as a recording studio or Motion capture studio. 9) Compete with global simulation game market, which will leave hundreds of games from the competition. 10) redeemers of its competitors: you can make them work for you, or destroy them
